SEARCH
Package com.github.utils.src.main

Class JwtUtils

java.lang.Object
com.github.utils.src.main.JwtUtils
public final class JwtUtils extends Object
Utility class for generating, validating, and extracting information from JSON Web Tokens (JWTs).

This class provides methods for creating JWT tokens with custom claims, validating tokens against a secret key, extracting claims and subjects from tokens, and checking token expiration. It supports both symmetric and asymmetric signing algorithms.

  • Method Details

    • generateToken

      public static String generateToken(String secretKey, String subject, Map<String,Object> claims, long expirationMillis)
      Generates a JWT token with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key for signing.
      subject - The subject (usually user identifier).
      claims - Additional claims to include.
      expirationMillis - Expiration time in milliseconds.
      Returns:
      Signed JWT token as a String.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if secretKey or subject is null or empty

    • generateAccessToken

      public static String generateAccessToken(String secretKey, String subject, Map<String,Object> claims)
      Generates a standard access token with default expiration (1 hour).
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key for signing.
      subject - The subject (usually user identifier).
      claims - Additional claims to include.
      Returns:
      Signed JWT token as a String.

    • generateRefreshToken

      public static String generateRefreshToken(String secretKey, String subject)
      Generates a refresh token with extended expiration (7 days).
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key for signing.
      subject - The subject (usually user identifier).
      Returns:
      Signed JWT refresh token as a String.

    • generateTokenWithAlgorithm

      public static String generateTokenWithAlgorithm(String secretKey, String subject, Map<String,Object> claims, long expirationMillis, io.jsonwebtoken.SignatureAlgorithm algorithm)
      Generates a JWT token with a custom signing algorithm.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key.
      subject - The subject (user ID).
      claims - Additional claims.
      expirationMillis - Expiration time.
      algorithm - The signature algorithm (e.g., HS256, HS512).
      Returns:
      Signed JWT token.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if secretKey or subject is null or empty

    • generateTokenWithAsymmetricKey

      public static String generateTokenWithAsymmetricKey(Key privateKey, String subject, Map<String,Object> claims, long expirationMillis, io.jsonwebtoken.SignatureAlgorithm algorithm)
      Generates a JWT token using asymmetric key pair (RS256, RS384, RS512).
      Parameters:
      privateKey - The private key for signing.
      subject - The subject (user ID).
      claims - Additional claims.
      expirationMillis - Expiration time.
      algorithm - The signature algorithm (e.g., RS256).
      Returns:
      Signed JWT token.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if privateKey or subject is null

    • validateToken

      public static boolean validateToken(String secretKey, String token)
      Validates a JWT token.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key used for validation.
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      True if valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if secretKey or token is null or empty

    • validateTokenWithAsymmetricKey

      public static boolean validateTokenWithAsymmetricKey(Key publicKey, String token)
      Validates a JWT token signed with an asymmetric key.
      Parameters:
      publicKey - The public key used for validation.
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      True if valid, false otherwise.

    • extractClaims

      public static io.jsonwebtoken.Claims extractClaims(String secretKey, String token)
      Extracts claims from the token.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key used for validation.
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      Claims object.
      Throws:
      io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - if token is invalid

    • extractClaimsSafely

      public static Optional<io.jsonwebtoken.Claims> extractClaimsSafely(String secretKey, String token)
      Extracts claims from the token without throwing exceptions.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key used for validation.
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      Optional containing Claims if token is valid, empty Optional otherwise.

    • extractClaim

      public static <T> T extractClaim(String secretKey, String token, Function<io.jsonwebtoken.Claims,T> claimsResolver)
      Generic method to extract a specific claim from token.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the claim to extract.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key used for validation.
      token - The JWT token.
      claimsResolver - Function that resolves the desired claim from Claims object.
      Returns:
      The claim value.

      Extracts the subject from the token without throwing exceptions.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key used for validation.
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      Optional containing subject if token is valid, empty Optional otherwise.

    • isTokenExpired

      public static boolean isTokenExpired(String secretKey, String token)
      Checks if the token is expired.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key used for validation.
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      True if expired, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - if token is invalid

    • extractClaim

      public static Object extractClaim(String secretKey, String token, String claimKey)
      Extracts a specific claim from the token.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key used for validation.
      token - The JWT token.
      claimKey - The key of the claim to extract.
      Returns:
      The claim value as an Object (can be cast to String, Integer, etc.).
      Throws:
      io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - if token is invalid

    • extractClaim

      public static <T> T extractClaim(String secretKey, String token, String claimKey, Class<T> type)
      Typed version of extractClaim.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type to cast the claim to.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key used for validation.
      token - The JWT token.
      claimKey - The key of the claim to extract.
      type - The Class object for T.
      Returns:
      The claim value cast to type T.
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - if the claim cannot be cast to T

    • extractClaimOrDefault

      public static <T> T extractClaimOrDefault(String secretKey, String token, String claimKey, Class<T> type, T defaultValue)
      Safely extract a typed claim with fallback to default value.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type to cast the claim to.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key used for validation.
      token - The JWT token.
      claimKey - The key of the claim to extract.
      type - The Class object for T.
      defaultValue - The default value to return if claim extraction fails.
      Returns:
      The claim value cast to type T, or defaultValue if extraction fails.

    • refreshToken

      public static String refreshToken(String secretKey, String token, long newExpirationMs)
      Refreshes a JWT token with a new expiration time.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key.
      token - The existing token.
      newExpirationMs - New expiration time in milliseconds.
      Returns:
      The refreshed token.
      Throws:
      io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - if token is invalid

    • isTokenExpiringSoon

      public static boolean isTokenExpiringSoon(String secretKey, String token, long bufferTimeMs)
      Checks if a JWT token will expire soon.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key.
      token - The JWT token.
      bufferTimeMs - Time before expiry to consider (e.g., 5 mins).
      Returns:
      True if the token will expire soon, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - if token is invalid

      Returns:
      A Base64 encoded secret key.

      Generates a random key pair for asymmetric signing (RSA).
      Returns:
      A KeyPair containing a private and public key.

    • parsePublicKey

      Returns:
      Key object.

    • decodeTokenWithoutValidation

      public static io.jsonwebtoken.Claims decodeTokenWithoutValidation(String token)
      Decodes a JWT token without validation. WARNING: This method doesn't verify the signature, so it should only be used when the token integrity is guaranteed by other means.
      Parameters:
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      Claims (decoded payload).
      Throws:
      io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - if the token format is invalid

    • getTokenRemainingTime

      public static long getTokenRemainingTime(String secretKey, String token)
      Gets the remaining lifetime of the token in milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key.
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      Remaining lifetime in milliseconds.
      Throws:
      io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - if token is invalid

    • extractTokenFromHeader

      public static Optional<String> extractTokenFromHeader(String authHeader)
      Extracts the JWT token from an Authorization header.
      Parameters:
      authHeader - The Authorization header (e.g., "Bearer ").
      Returns:
      Optional containing the extracted JWT token, or empty if invalid.

    • validateTokenWithDetails

      public static JwtUtils.TokenValidationResult validateTokenWithDetails(String secretKey, String token)
      Validates a JWT token and returns error messages if invalid.
      Parameters:
      secretKey - The secret key.
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      TokenValidationResult containing validation status and any error message.

    • createAuthorizationHeader

      public static String createAuthorizationHeader(String token)
      Creates an authorization header value with the token.
      Parameters:
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      Authorization header value (e.g., "Bearer ").

    • parseSecretKey

      public static SecretKey parseSecretKey(String base64SecretKey)
      Parses a Base64 encoded HMAC secret key.
      Parameters:
      base64SecretKey - Base64 encoded secret key.
      Returns:
      SecretKey object.
